alert.note: Alert for Camas Prairie (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 28 at 10:24PM MST until March 01 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. Wind gusts up to 35 mph will cause blowing and drifting snow and reduced visibility. * WHERE...Camas Prairie zone. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and significantly reduced visibilities due to snow and blowing snow.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
